wordpressPage.title: Isle of Wight
wordpressPage.content:
Residential centres in the Isle of Wight

Westbrook Centre – Isle of Wight – Website –  This centre is run by Urban Saints and offers a range of options for school, church and Urban Saints Groups. Please visit their website for more information.

Kingswood Isle of Wight – Bembridge, Isle of Wight – Website

Kingswood centres can provide accommodation and activities for a variety of residentials and offer a host of programme options. Kingswood’s Isle of Wight centre covers 100 acres of beautiful fields and woodlands in a superb cliff top location, overlooking Whitecliff Bay, with direct beach access.
